Filipino(fil):
Aralin natin ang intersection.

Kumanan sa susunod na intersection. Tandaan na 20 kph ang speed limit sa intersection.
English(en):
Let's learn about the intersection.

Turn right on the next intersection. Note that 20 kph is the speed limit in the intersection.

Filipino(fil): Tandaan na tuwing kakanan sa intersection, manatili sa kanang lane. Ngayon, bumalik sa intersection at kumaliwa.
English(en): Remember that when turning right on an intersection, make sure to stay on the right lane.  Next, go back to the intersection and turn left.
You performed a left turn instead of a right turn.
You performed a U-turn instead of a right turn.

Filipino(fil): Tandaan na tuwing kakanan sa intersection, manatili sa kanang lane. Ngayon, bumalik sa intersection at kumaliwa.
English(en): Remember that when turning right on an intersection, make sure to stay on the right lane.  Next, go back to the intersection and turn left.

Filipino(fil): Tandaan na tuwing kakaliwa sa intersection, manatili sa kaliwang lane. Ngayon, bumalik sa intersection at mag-U-turn naman.
English(en): Remember that when turning left on an intersection, make sure to stay on the left lane.  Next, go back to the intersection and perform a U-turn.
You performed a right turn instead of a left turn.
You performed a U-turn instead of a left turn.

Filipino(fil): Tandaan na tuwing kakaliwa sa intersection, manatili sa kaliwang lane. Ngayon, bumalik sa intersection at mag-U-turn naman.
English(en): Remember that when turning left on an intersection, make sure to stay on the left lane.  Next, go back to the intersection and perform a U-turn.
Make a U-turn on the intersection.

Filipino(fil): Tandaan na tuwing kakanan sa intersection, manatili sa kanang lane. Ngayon, bumalik sa intersection at kumaliwa.
English(en): Remember that when turning right on an intersection, make sure to stay on the right lane.  Next, go back to the intersection and turn left.
You performed a left turn instead of a U-turn.
You performed a right turn instead of a U-turn.

Filipino(fil): Tandaan na mag-U-turn sa inner lane. Ngayon, bumalik sa intersection at dumiretso lang.
English(en): Remember to do a U-turn on the inner lane. Finally, return to the intersection and go straight through it.

Filipino(fil): Tandaan na sundin ang traffic lights. At kahit wala, magmaneho pa rin nang mahinahon at maging mapagmasid sa ibang kotse sa daan.
English(en): Make sure to follow the traffic lights. And if there are none, drive carefully still and observe if there are oncoming vehicles before proceeding.
